casebody.data:
Florence W. Haigh, and another, Respondents v. Christine H. Crocker, et al., Appellants. Decided March 14, 1892. Appeal by defendants from order continuing injunction. D. A. Stephens, for appellants. Foster & Stephens, attorneys, and George W. Stephens of counsel, for respondents.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., Dugro and Gildersleeve, JJ.

Per Curiam.

Order affirmed, with $10 costs to abide the event.
